Browser extension to intercept and modify HTTP requests before to be forward to the server.
This browser extension allows users to intercept and modify HTTP requests before they are sent to the server. It provides a user-friendly interface to view, edit, and manipulate request headers, body, and other parameters. Users can create custom rules to automate modifications based on specific criteria, such as URL patterns or request types. This extension is useful for developers and testers who need to debug or test web applications by altering requests on the fly. Features include:
- Intercepting HTTP requests in real-time
- Modifying request headers and body
- Creating custom rules for automatic modifications
- User-friendly interface for managing requests
- Support for various HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.)
- Option to save and load modification rules for future use
- Compatibility with popular browsers like Chrome and Firefox
